page.title: 13CAMBORNES FAVOURITE ASPECTS
page.content:
We asked{700}people what their favourite aspects of Camborne were. Listed below are the top{3}favourites
{UNDER 16s}-1:Friends,33%. 2:Countryside,15%. 3:Family,8%. {16-20s}-1:Friends,29%. 2:Beaches/Sea,24%. 3:Girlfriend,12%. {20-30s}-1:Beaches/Sea,33%. 2:Peace,14% 3:Family,14%. {30-40s}-1:Beaches/Sea,30%. 2:Friends,17%. 3:Family,13%. {40-50s}-1:Beaches/Sea,31%. 2:Friends,17%. 3:Peace,17%. {50-60s}-1:Countryside,30%. 2:Beaches/Sea,15%. 3:Friends,11%. {Over 60s}-1:Family,31%. 2:Friends,23%. 3:Countryside,15%.
